Cameron Grant, known for his elegant and beautifully photographed movies such as The Dinner Party and Elements of Desire, makes a radical departure from his signature work to direct what is essentially a gonzo video. Shameless Desire features several very well-known porn stars in six shot-on-video scenes. Each of the scenes are named, starting with "Tardy," with Jill Kelly and Eric Price. After coming home late from a night out, Eric punishes Jill by having her DP a pair of butt plugs under her pantyhose. Next, in "Fellatio Appassionata," a piano recital turns into a threeway between Asia Carrera, Vivienne, and Vince Voyuer. Dildos and sex toys fly when Missy, Felecia, Raylene, and Jill Kelly get together for an afternoon lesbian fest in "Four for Bridge." The fourth scene, "Best Friends" has Jake Steed sharing his wife, Mila, with his best friend, Billy Glide, and by doing so he fulfills the fantasies of all three. The video finishes up with a submissive Tom Byron worshiping the feet (and other body parts) of a domineering Nici Sterling in "Thirsty." The only hint that you've just watched a Cameron Grant video is seeing one of his trademark mantras after the closing credits: "Dogma separates. Truth unites." (that doesn't quite fit as well following a gonzo as it might after a feature) - AVN Review
